name: TOREj: Red Cubes
description:
TOREj: Red Cubes is a puzzle game where the goal is to build a tower the way it reaches and touches all the red cubes in the polygon without it collapsing and falling of the platform. You can play different styles like building as high as you can or trying to make a stable construction. Every one of them is fine as long as you don't break your creation.

Your every move is consisted of cube preposition places rotating frequently and your job is to find the one you think will create the most stable construction and confirm it.

Solve all the levels and build all the towers. Enjoy yourself, builder.
